description:
It`s spring, and with her shiny new backpack on, Miyauchi Renge heads out to practice going to elementary school for her entrance ceremony. Koshigaya Komari and Natsumi also arrive, and they all take the bus there together, but when they arrive, Renge is told that she can`t enter the classroom until the next day. So Renge explores the school she`ll soon be attending, nervous but full of hope. The slow, light-hearted story of rural school life begins once more!
Source: crunchyroll
